content: i present to you my first knitting pattern i love the look of stranded colorwork but hate the feeling of floats on the foot that s why this pattern has only a short colorwork section on the leg i ve added a fun cable motif running down the leg to keep the process of knitting the rest of the sock fun and engaging there are two colorwork charts and two texture charts in the pattern for right and left sock they are one size only but can be adapted notes in the pattern for a bigger or smaller size this pattern is more like a general guideline on making socks but don t hesitate to ask if you have some problems i ll be happy to help you can also tag me on instagram if you decide to share your finished socks i d love to see them i m @crochetedbybogusia and yes my main thing is crocheting don t be alarmed please note that this pattern has not been tested if you notice any errors please let me know and i ll fix them immediately
